name: Lantern - for Ludum Dare 40
description:
Lantern.

You walk in the shoes… err.. in the barefeet of a child, wandering through Boogeyland, where nightmares chase and hunt you, until your heart can’t take no more.

Your only allies are your lantern and faint fireflies, scattered around the eerie wasteland, to bring you some rest to your soul.

Run child, run! Until the endless run is over...

Lantern is an endless dodge game, where you can use WASD keys to move in the cave, Left SHIFT to RUN, U and I to shrink and enlarge lantern radius.

Keep the Monsters outside your lantern radius to preserve your heartrate.

Follow the compass to find and collect fireflies to lower your heartrate.

Game is localized in:
- English
- German
- Hebrew
- Italian
- Russian
- Slovak
- Spanish

Galit Weisberg - Art, Animations

Ofir Hanin - Additional art

Ruslan Stepanov - Programmer

Jaroslav Vozár - Programmer

Connor Pymm - Programmer

Kemal Afzal - Programmer

Giorgio Vezzini - Audio, Management

Ludum Dare URL :https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/lantern
